name: foxcorebasedsystem
0:
”Alexa, turn on TV”
”Alexa, turn off spots”
”Alexa, increase office by 5 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
foxcore is an open modular operating system for building automation environments with a comprehensive toolkit for every system manufacturer and software developer

controllable objects are:
- Lights (on/off)
- Color lights
- Tunable white lights
- Dimmable lights
- All switchable devices (on/off)
- Temperature control
- Temperature reading
- Scenes
- Sequences


Get in contact with us to obtain an account to use your Alexa with a foxcore based system.

For more information check out our website at https://www.intefox.com
